name: Terrorist Attack Crazy :Action
description:
It’s time to become army commando of modern combat and lets fight with counter terrorist with your powerful army weapons and be the professional first person shooter in this fps battle royale. You have played many FPS shooting games and war strategy games but this counter terrorist game of first person shooter has critical strike and counter attack missions which are unseen in many action shooting games & battle royale games.
Features
First person shooting game having combat actions
Become shooting hero in sniper games
Extreme gun fire in war missions
Critical strike and latest warfare fps war strategy
Realistic 3D graphics and last battleground sounds
